Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove Testimonials and Contact sections

- Removed Feedbacks and Contact components from App.jsx
- Removed #contact navigation link from constants
- Deleted Contact.jsx, Feedbacks.jsx component files
- Removed EarthCanvas component and Earth.jsx file
- Deleted planet 3D model directory (public/planet)
- Removed testimonials data from constants/index.js
- Removed testimonial images and directory (src/assets/testimonials)
- Uninstalled @emailjs/browser dependency
- Updated component exports in components/index.js and canvas/index.js
- Updated asset exports in assets/index.js
- Added bottom margin to Works section for better layout spacing
- Fixed .eslintrc.cjs syntax (export default -> module.exports)

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
